name: The Blintz
description: Bred by Terraform Genetics, The Bintz is a dense hybrid strain that crosses Cheese Quake with Josh D.O.G. Its aroma is a mix of cheese and berries, finishing with the classic piney OG flavor. The Blintz, making this an ideal strain for daytime activity.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Creative, Energetic, Focused, Happy, Cramps, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Pain
